item.description:
F1 Boston posted the schedules for the winter league events. Registration forms and times can be found here:
http://www.f1boston.com/index.cfm/page/League-and-School-Schedules-and-Registrations/pid/10261

A little about each:
Champions league - for drivers over 60
Open league - excellent way to get the thrill of league racing without committing to 6 races. Race day includes 10 lap practice and 3 30 lap races
Pro league - for experienced league racers, often there is a qualifying day you must attend to be eligible for the league. Race day includes qualifying session and 3 30 lap races.
Sprint league - for new and experience racers. Race day includes practice session and 4 30 lap races.

Registration is due by January 7th!
item.name: F1 Boston Winter Leagues
